MARK 3.7 jah Iesus aflaiþ miþ siponjam seinaim du marein, jah filu manageins us Galeilaia laistidedun afar imma, MARK 3.8 jah us Iudaia jah us Iairusaulwmim jah us Idumaia jah hindana Iaurdanaus;
jah þai bi Twra jah Seidona, manageins filu, gahausjandans ƕan filu is tawida, qemun at imma.
MARK 3.9 jah qaþ þaim siponjam seinaim ei skip habaiþ wesi at imma in þizos manageins, ei ni þraiheina ina.

MARK 3.10 managans auk gahailida, swaswe drusun ana ina ei imma attaitokeina, jah swa managai swe habaidedun wundufnjos MARK 3.11 jah ahmans unhrainjans, þaih þan ina gaseƕun, drusun du imma jah hropidedun qiþandans þatei
þu is sunus gudis.
MARK 3.12 jah filu andbait ins ei ina ni gaswikunþidedeina.
MARK 3.13 jah ustaig in fairguni jah athaihait þanzei wilda is, jah galiþun du imma.
MARK 3.14 jah gawaurhta twalif du wisan miþ sis, jah ei insandidedi ins merjan MARK 3.15 jah haban waldufni du hailjan sauhtins jah uswairpan unhulþons.
MARK 3.16 jah gasatida Seimona namo Paitrus;
MARK 3.17 jah Iakobau þamma Zaibaidaiaus jah Iohanne broþr Iakobaus jah gasatida im namna Bauanairgais, þatei ist: sunjus þeiƕons;
MARK 3.18 jah Andraian jah Filippu jah Barþaulaumaiu jah Matþaiu jah Þoman jah Iakobu þana Alfaiaus jah Þaddaiu jah Seimona þana Kananeiten MARK 3.19 jah Iudan Iskarioten, saei jah galewida ina.
MARK 3.20 jah atiddjedun in gard, jah gaïddja sik aftra managei, swaswe ni mahtedun nih hlaif matjan.
MARK 3.21 jah hausjandans fram imma bokarjos jah anþarai usiddjedun gahaban ina;
qeþun auk þatei usgaisiþs ist.
MARK 3.22 jah bokarjos þai af Iairusaulwmai qimandans qeþun þatei Baiailzaibul habaiþ, jah þatei in þamma reikistin unhulþono uswairpiþ þaim unhulþom.
MARK 3.23 jah athaitands ins in gajukom qaþ du im:
ƕaiwa mag Satanas Satanan uswairpan?
MARK 3.24 jah jabai þiudangardi wiþra sik gadailjada, ni mag standan so þiudangardi jaina.
MARK 3.25 jah jabai gards wiþra sik gadailjada, ni mag standan sa gards jains.
MARK 3.26 jah jabai Satana usstoþ ana sik silban jah gadailiþs warþ, ni mag gastandan, ak andi habaiþ.
MARK 3.27 ni manna mag kasa swinþis galeiþands in gard is wilwan, niba faurþis þana swinþan gabindiþ;
jah þan þana gard is diswilwai.
MARK 3.28 amen, qiþa izwis, þatei allata afletada þata frawaurhte sunum manne, jah naiteinos swa managos swaswe wajamerjand;
MARK 3.29 aþþan saei wajamereiþ ahman weihana ni habaiþ fralet aiw, ak skula ist aiweinaizos frawaurhtais.
MARK 3.30 unte qeþun:
ahman unhrainjana habaiþ.
MARK 3.31 jah qemun þan aiþei is jah broþrjus is jah uta standandona insandidedun du imma, haitandona ina.
MARK 3.32 jah setun bi ina managei;
qeþun þan du imma:
sai, aiþei þeina jah broþrjus þeinai jah swistrjus þeinos uta sokjand þuk.
MARK 3.33 jah andhof im qiþands:
ƕo ist so aiþei meina aiþþau þai broþrjus meinai?
MARK 3.34 jah bisaiƕands bisunjane þans bi sik sitandans qaþ:
sai, aiþei meina jah þai broþrjus meinai.
MARK 3.35 saei allis waurkeiþ wiljan gudis, sa jah broþar meins jah swistar jah aiþei ist.
MARK 4.1 Jah aftra dugann laisjan at marein, jah galesun sik du imma manageins filu, swaswe ina galeiþandan in skip gasitan in marein;
jah alla so managei wiþra marein ana staþa was.
MARK 4.2 jah laisida ins in gajukom manag jah qaþ im in laiseinai seinai:
MARK 4.3 hauseiþ!
sai, urrann sa saiands du saian fraiwa seinamma.
MARK 4.4 jah warþ, miþþanei saiso, sum raihtis gadraus faur wig, jah qemun fuglos jah fretun þata.
MARK 4.5 anþar-uþ-þan gadraus ana stainahamma, þarei ni habaida airþa managa, jah suns urrann, in þizei ni habaida diupaizos airþos;
